en.title: Why?
en.intro:
Many people are forced to escape from armed conflicts, discrimination or poverty,
fleeing to find  the peace and civil rights that they are missing at home. However,
there are no safe pathways and people are exposed to hunger, pain and trauma.
en.fullInto: Many people are forced to escape from armed conflicts, discrimination or poverty. Most of them flee to find in Europe the peace and civil rights that they are missing at home. However, there are no safe pathways to migrate and people are exposed to hunger, pain and trauma while authorities reject them applying violence instead of sustainable solutions.
en.testimonial: "It was midnight. We were in the forest in Croatia when the police stopped us. I told them I need asylum, because my life is in danger, but they laugh at me and started to hit us with their sticks..."
en.victim: Ava (26 years old). She is moving from Iran to Germany.
